summary: As an acomplished member of the Thieves Guild you can now learn the Summon Lockpick Spell.
descriptionHtml:
As an acomplished member of the Thieves Guild you can now learn the Summon Lockpick Spell.
This handy spell summons a lockpick to your inventory. 
Very handy when you are stuck in jail or your last lockpick breaks just when you are close to getting some exciting treasure!

Obtaining the Spell:

Enter the Ragged Flagon Cistern and head over to Mercer Frey\'s Desk.
On the desk you will find a Spell Tome to teach you the new spell.

Installation:
Install using Nexus Mod Manager

Please feel free to leave any comments, suggestions or bugs.

I hope you enjoy using your new spell!

Other Mods I have done that might interest you:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27591
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27338
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26099
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26201

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

SoulMasterII

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]Please, DO NOT upload any part of my mods anywhere else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII
